statements: UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE Inventory SET price = 25.99, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 20, price = 15.99 WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE Inventory SET price = 25.50, quantity = 15 WHERE product_id = 102
UPDATE products SET product_name='New Product Name', product_price=15.99 WHERE product_id=1;
UPDATE categories SET category_name='New Category Name', category_description='New Category Description' WHERE category_id=3;
UPDATE products SET product_price = 25.99, product_quantity = product_quantity - 1 WHERE product_id = 123
UPDATE categories SET category_description = 'New and Improved Description', category_name = 'Updated Category Name' WHERE category_id = 456
UPDATE products SET price = 15.99 WHERE product_id = 1
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 2 AND warehouse_id = 1
UPDATE products SET quantity = 20 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50, warehouse_id = 2 WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE products SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET in_stock = false, product_id = 2, category_id = 1 WHERE inventory_id = 3;
UPDATE products SET price = 25.99, quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE inventory SET in_stock = false WHERE product_id = 105;
UPDATE products SET quantity = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE categories SET category_name = 'Electronics' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE products SET quantity = quantity - 5, price = price * 1.1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890', contact_name = 'John Doe' WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier XYZ';
